localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
blogPost.body: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
blogPost.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals
blogPost.author: Todd Soulas

localize.description: Kintell是一个平台，通过付费和公益视频咨询，将寻求建议的人与有资格提供建议的人联系起来。通过Kintell视频平台，浏览顾问，预订会话，并与他们交谈。
localize.tagline: 经过审核的专业人员提供1对1的视频建议和指导。

localize.description: Kintell是一個平臺，通過付費和公益視頻諮詢，將尋求建議的人與有資格提供建議的人聯繫起來。通過Kintell視頻平臺，瀏覽顧問，預訂會話，並與他們交談。
localize.tagline: 經過審覈的專業人員提供1對1的視頻建議和指導。

previous.excerpt: OpenReel empowers distributed enterprise, media, entertainment, and agency teams to remotely control, direct, script, film, and collaborate on high definition video projects from a mobile device or webcam in over 125 countries
previous.title: OpenReel - Simple remote video production

localize.description: OpenReel使分布式企业、媒体、娱乐和代理团队能够在超过125个国家通过移动设备或网络摄像头对高清视频项目进行远程控制、导演、编剧、拍摄和协作。
OpenReel使分佈式企業、媒體、娛樂和代理團隊能夠在超過125個國家通過移動設備或網絡攝像頭對高清視頻項目進行遠程控制、導演、編劇、拍攝和協作。

next.excerpt: Guardians is a personal safety app designed to be used with your close family & trusted friends. It starts with location sharing but it’s lot more than that.
next.title: Guardians - A safety app for women

localize.description: Guardians是一款专为你的亲密家人和值得信赖的朋友而设计的个人安全应用。它从位置共享开始，但它的功能远不止于此。
Guardians是一款專爲你的親密家人和值得信賴的朋友而設計的個人安全應用。它從位置共享開始，但它的功能遠不止於此。
